Problem: a. Adult symptom(s)
Code: 272.4 Hyperlipidemia
Careplan:
Patient Education: 1. reduce dietary saturated fats to less than 10% total calories
2. reduce weight
3. restrict total fat to < 30% of total calories
4. limit cholesterol to < 300 mg/d
5. allow carbohydrates to account for 50-60% of calories. Substitute complex carbohydrates for saturated fats, increase intake of soluble fiber.
